name: Miscellaneous.Wars
description:
sThe concept of the game was a goofy platform brawler where instead of actual weapons you would use a bunch of miscellaneous items to fight each other.

The two ways to win would either be to get the opponent's hp to zero or to get them to fall off the map. The three weapons we worked on were a swordfish close-range weapon an apple that explodes on contact or after a short period if missed and a banana gun.

The movement relies on momentum requiring you to build up speed to be able to make it from platform to platform. 

(Due to an error caused by instances the game is currently unplayable)

Team

Kieran J Marsden

Marek Grzegorczyk (3d Artist)
